mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_BASIC_CHAR USING DUAL ON (basic_id = #{basicId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET basic_nm = #{basicNm}, basic_ctnt = #{basicCtnt}, basic_file_path = #{basicFilePath}, mod_date = #{modDate}, mod_nm = #{modNm}, personality = #{personality}, public_private = #{publicPrivate} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( basic_no, basic_id, basic_nm, basic_ctnt, basic_file_path, reg_date, reg_nm, mod_date, mod_nm, personality, public_private ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BASIC_NO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_BASIC_CHAR), 'BASC00'+(SELECT NVL(MAX(BASIC_NO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_BASIC_CHAR), #{basicNm}, #{basicCtnt}, #{basicFilePath}, #{regDate}, #{regNm}, #{modDate}, #{modNm}, #{personality}, #{publicPrivate} )
